net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: dnd5e_AttackEditor_setAttackExpression
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.toolTip:
Persists the attack expression associted to the token. Key names are stored encoded and this macro encodes them for convenience. Returns the object with encoded keys.
arg (0) = attackObj with decoded keys arg (1) (optional) = boolean: merge generated descriptors from original attack json; Default is false. returns attackObj with encoded keys
